parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure and Rear Wheel Lock-Up
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission and rear wheel lock-up can cause serious injury or death, and leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission may malfunction
causing the rear wheel to lock up
which can lead to loss of control
accidents
or injuries.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of repair parts can cause delays in fixing the transmission and rear wheel lock-up issues, leaving the driver stranded and at risk of accidents.
symptoms: Dealerships do not have the necessary parts to perform the recall repairs
and the manufacturer is unable to provide a timeline for when the parts will be available.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of communication and poor customer service from the manufacturer and dealerships can cause frustration and anxiety for the driver, and may lead to further safety risks.
symptoms: Drivers are not notified of the recall in a timely manner
and when they contact the manufacturer or dealerships
they are met with unhelpful or rude responses
and are not provided with a clear timeline for when the repairs will be completed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the CPS can cause the engine to shut down while traveling at high speeds, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The engine shuts down while traveling at high speeds
error code 12 appears on the speedometer
the motorcycle will not start
the CPS wire becomes separated from its connecting wire inside the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the CPS wiring can cause the engine to stall, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially on high-speed roads.
symptoms: The engine stalls or dies while driving
the vehicle experiences a sudden loss of power
the engine warning light illuminates on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: CPS Timing Sensor Wire Tension Issue
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive tension on the CPS timing sensor wires can cause them to cut or fray, leading to engine stalling and loss of power, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The engine stalls or dies while driving
the vehicle experiences a sudden loss of power
the engine warning light illuminates on the dashboard.
